actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to strengthen and improve the quality of mathematics and science education, and for other purposes.
short_title: Dwight D. Eisenhower Mathematics and Science Education Amendments of 1993

summary.text: Dwight D. Eisenhower Mathematics and Science Education Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (of which title II part A is the Dwight D. Eisenhower Mathematics and Science Education Act) to revise provisions for mathematics and science education grants and programs with respect to: (1) in-State apportionment; (2) elementary and secondary education programs; (3) higher education programs; (4) technical assistance and evaluation; (5) administrative costs; and (6) State and local applications.

titles.title: Dwight D. Eisenhower Mathematics and Science Education Amendments of 1993
To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to strengthen and improve the quality of mathematics and science education, and for other purposes.
